name: 6lbr
tagline: A deployment-ready 6LoWPAN Border Router solution based on Contiki
body: A 6LoWPAN Border Router connects your 6LoWPAN devices to the Internet and is responsible for handling traffic to and from the IPv6 and 802.15.4 interfaces. 6LBR is a deployment-ready solution for border routers, based on [**Contiki OS**](http://www.contiki-os.org). It runs best on low-cost, open source embedded hardware platforms like the [RaspberryPi](http://www.raspberrypi.org/), the [Econotag](http://www.redwirellc.com/store/node/1) and the [BeagleBone](http://beagleboard.org/bone). ![Overview](https://github.com/cetic/6lbr/wiki/images/6lbr-top-medium-grey.png) ### Getting Started * The [6LBR wiki documentation](https://github.com/cetic/6lbr/wiki) provdes an overview of the project and gives some insight on the implementation. * If you already own one of the [supported platforms](https://github.com/cetic/6lbr/wiki/Supported-Hardware), grab a couple of your favorite Contiki motes and get started right away! ### Contact The [6LBR issue tracker](https://github.com/cetic/6lbr/issues) is open to all. Also, feel free to contact us for feedback or bugfixes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
